location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires, Tehran

mods.abstract: Riach informs Willock that there would be no difficulty in meeting the drafts arising from the disposal of his bills for 223,940 rupees. However, almost the whole weight of Willock's bills had fallen on the Bombay Government.
